verses.verse: For I do not <S%G2309>want<s%> you to be <S%G50>unaware,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> that our <S%G3962>fathers<s%> were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3507>cloud,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1330>passed<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> the <S%G2281>sea;<s%>
and <S%G3956>all<s%> were <S%G907>baptized<s%> into <S%G3475>Moses<s%> in the <S%G3507>cloud<s%> and in the <S%G2281>sea;<s%>
and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2068>ate<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G1033>food;<s%>

and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4095>drank<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G4188>drink,<s%> for they were <S%G4095>drinking<s%> from a <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G4073>rock<s%> which <S%G190>followed<s%> them; and the <S%G4073>rock<s%> was <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
<S%G235>Nevertheless,<s%> with <S%G4183>most<s%> of them <S%G2316>God<s%> was not well-pleased; for they were <S%G2693>laid<s%> <S%G2693>low<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G1096>happened<s%> as <S%G5179>examples<s%> for us, that we should not <S%G1510>crave<s%> <S%G1938><s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G2556>things,<s%> as they <S%G2548>also<s%> <S%G1937>craved.<s%>

And do not be <S%G1496>idolaters,<s%> as <S%G5100>some<s%> of them were; as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "The <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> to <S%G2068>eat<s%> and <S%G4095>drink,<s%> and <S%G450>stood<s%> up to <S%G3815>play.<s%>"

<S%G3366>Nor<s%> let us <S%G4203>act<s%> <S%G4203>immorally,<s%> as <S%G5100>some<s%> of them <S%G4203>did,<s%> and twenty-three <S%G5505>thousand<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>
<S%G3366>Nor<s%> let us <S%G1598>try<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> as <S%G5100>some<s%> of them <S%G3985>did,<s%> and were <S%G622>destroyed<s%> by the <S%G3789>serpents.<s%>
<S%G3366>Nor<s%> <S%G1111>grumble,<s%> as <S%G5100>some<s%> of them <S%G1111>did,<s%> and were <S%G622>destroyed<s%> by the <S%G3644>destroyer.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G4819>happened<s%> to them as an <S%G5179>example,<s%> and they were <S%G1125>written<s%> for our <S%G3559>instruction,<s%> upon <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G5056>ends<s%> of the <S%G165>ages<s%> have <S%G2658>come.<s%>
<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> let him who <S%G1380>thinks<s%> he <S%G2476>stands<s%> <S%G991>take<s%> <S%G991>heed<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> he <S%G4098>fall.<s%>

<S%G3756>No<s%> <S%G3986>temptation<s%> has <S%G2983>overtaken<s%> you but <S%G442>such<s%> as is <S%G442>common<s%> to <S%G442>man;<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G4103>faithful,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> will not <S%G1439>allow<s%> you to be <S%G3985>tempted<s%> <S%G5228>beyond<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you are <S%G1410>able,<s%> but with the <S%G3986>temptation<s%> will <S%G4160>provide<s%> the <S%G1545>way<s%> of <S%G1545>escape<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> that you may be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G5297>endure<s%> it.
<S%G1355>Therefore,<s%> my <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G5343>flee<s%> from <S%G1495>idolatry.<s%>
I <S%G3004>speak<s%> as to <S%G5429>wise<s%> <S%G5429>men;<s%> you <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G5346>say.<s%>

Is not the <S%G4221>cup<s%> of <S%G2129>blessing<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2127>bless<s%> a <S%G2842>sharing<s%> in the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>? Is not the <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2806>break<s%> a <S%G2842>sharing<s%> in the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>?

<S%G3754>Since<s%> there is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> we who are <S%G4183>many<s%> are <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body;<s%> for we <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3348>partake<s%> of the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>
<S%G991>Look<s%> at the <S%G4561>nation<s%> <S%G2474>Israel;<s%> are not <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2068>eat<s%> the <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G2844>sharers<s%> in the <S%G2379>altar<s%>?

<S%G5101>What<s%> do I <S%G5346>mean<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? That a <S%G1494>thing<s%> <S%G1494>sacrificed<s%> to <S%G1494>idols<s%> is <S%G5100>anything,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> that an <S%G1497>idol<s%> is <S%G5100>anything<s%>?

[No,] but [I say] that the things <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2380>sacrifice,<s%> they <S%G2380>sacrifice<s%> to <S%G1140>demons,<s%> and not to <S%G2316>God;<s%> and I do not <S%G2309>want<s%> you to <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2844>sharers<s%> in <S%G1140>demons.<s%>

You <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> the <S%G4221>cup<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> and the <S%G4221>cup<s%> of <S%G1140>demons;<s%> you <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3348>partake<s%> of the <S%G5132>table<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> and the <S%G5132>table<s%> of <S%G1140>demons.<s%>
<S%G2228>Or<s%> do we <S%G3863>provoke<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> to <S%G3863>jealousy<s%>? We are not <S%G2478>stronger<s%> than He, are we?

<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1832>lawful,<s%> but not <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G4851>profitable.<s%> <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1832>lawful,<s%> but not <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3618>edify.<s%>
Let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> [good,] but that of his <S%G2087>neighbor.<s%>

<S%G2068>Eat<s%> <S%G3956>anything<s%> that is <S%G4453>sold<s%> in the <S%G3111>meat<s%> <S%G3111>market,<s%> <S%G3367>without<s%> <S%G350>asking<s%> <S%G350>questions<s%> for conscience' <S%G1223>sake;<s%>
for the <S%G1093>earth<s%> is the Lord's, and <S%G4138>all<s%> it <S%G4138>contains.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G571>unbelievers<s%> <S%G2564>invites<s%> you, and you <S%G2309>wish<s%> to <S%G4198>go,<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G3956>anything<s%> that is <S%G3908>set<s%> <S%G3908>before<s%> you, <S%G3367>without<s%> <S%G350>asking<s%> <S%G350>questions<s%> for conscience' <S%G1223>sake.<s%>

But <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> should <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3778>"This<s%> is meat <S%G7094>sacrificed<s%> to <S%G7094>idols,<s%>" do not <S%G2068>eat<s%> [it,] for the <S%G1223>sake<s%> of the <S%G1565>one<s%> who <S%G3377>informed<s%> [you,] and for conscience' sake;

I <S%G3004>mean<s%> not your <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> but the <S%G2087>other<s%> [man's]; for <S%G2443>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> is my <S%G1657>freedom<s%> <S%G2919>judged<s%> by another's <S%G4893>conscience<s%>?

<S%G1487>If<s%> I <S%G3348>partake<s%> with <S%G5485>thankfulness,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> am I <S%G987>slandered<s%> <S%G5228>concerning<s%> that for <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2168>give<s%> <S%G2168>thanks<s%>?

<S%G1535>Whether,<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> you <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G5100>whatever<s%> you <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> to the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G1096>Give<s%> <S%G677>no<s%> <S%G677>offense<s%> <S%G2532>either<s%> to <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> to <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> to the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

<S%G2531>just<s%> as I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> not <S%G2212>seeking<s%> my <S%G1683>own<s%> <S%G4851>profit,<s%> but the [profit] of the <S%G4183>many,<s%> that they may be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>
